title: A Collection Of Ugly Sweaters For Your Holiday Gaming Needs
summary:
We may be sheltering in place until this pandemic ends, but that doesn't mean we have to abandon our holiday spirit.
Since we're locked away in our homes, there's no better time than now to throw on a holiday sweater.
Many of us wear these "beautiful" garments to one holiday party a year, and then retire them to the darkest corners of our closets.
Since no one can see us wearing them this year, we can enjoy these wonderful creations all season long.
If you're looking for new sweaters for your collection, I scoured the internet for the best of the best and rounded them up for you below.
paragraphs: We may be sheltering in place until this pandemic ends, but that doesn't mean we have to abandon our holiday spirit. Since we're locked away in our homes, there's no better time than now to throw on a holiday sweater.

Many of us wear these "beautiful" garments to one holiday party a year, and then retire them to the darkest corners of our closets. Since no one can see us wearing them this year, we can enjoy these wonderful creations all season long.
Just be careful of mirrors. You'll see your reflection, and may give yourself a heart attack from fright.
If you're looking for new sweaters for your collection, I scoured the internet for the best of the best and rounded them up for you below. I would actually wear a few of these out into public.
Pokémon Eevee Evolutions from Anime Ape
The Legend of Zelda from GameStop
Disclaimer: GameStop is the parent company of Game Informer

Andrew Has Dedicated His Life To Video Games.
